column6: (C)V-only -> Syllable type,/kɨtapotomapone/ -> Underlying form,[kɨ.ˈtaː.po.ˈtoː.ma.ˈpoː.ne] -> Phonetic,'you all helped him/her/it' -> Gloss,
non-(C)V-only -> Syllable type,/mempakane/ -> Underlying form,[ˈmem.pa.ˈkaː.ne] -> Phonetic,'you woke him/her up' -> Gloss,
im + ponoo + sewa -> Base,'not telling it' (stem: pono(pï)) -> Gloss,i-mpo-mponoosewa -> Reduplication,
non-(C)V-only -> Syllable type,/kehtəne/ -> Underlying form,[ˈkeh.tə.ne] -> Phonetic,'we (I+you) were' -> Gloss,
waitëne -> Base,'I pushed it' -> Gloss,waa-waitëne, or:,wai-waitëne -> Reduplication,
(C)V-only -> Syllable type,/amatakana/ -> Underlying form,[a.ˈmaː.ta.ˈkaː.na] -> Phonetic,'toucan sp.' -> Gloss,
s + et + ainka -> Base,'I ran (away)' -> Gloss,se-tain-tainka -> Reduplication,
wi-ponopï nkërë 'I still told O' -> Full (CV) Grade,wi-ponoh-tae 'I will tell O' -> Coda (C) Grade,wi-ponoo-ne 'I told O' -> Length (VV) Grade,wi-pono 'I told O' -> Zero Grade,
wi + pahka -> Base,'I hit/broke it' (stem: pahka) -> Gloss,wi-pah-pahka -> Reduplication,
w-onamï nkërë 'I still hid O' -> Full (CV) Grade,w-onan-tae 'I will hide O',w-onon-ne 'I hid O',w-onon 'I hid O' -> Coda (C) Grade,
'I pushed it again and again' -> Gloss,
non-(C)V-only -> Syllable type,/meekane/ -> Underlying form,[ˈmeː.ka.ne] -> Phonetic,'you bit him/her/it' -> Gloss,
wekarama -> Base,'I gave it' -> Gloss,weka-wekarama -> Reduplication,
mempaka -> Base,'you woke him/her up' -> Gloss,mee-mempaka -> Reduplication,
